body_html: @pietern We used to check if the NCCL version is good for c10d, now we don't, which means as long as USE_NCCL is on, libc10d will always be built with NCCL since we know we will not be using nccl 1 anywhere. So in turn, when we build csrc, the same thing should apply, that's what I told @anderspapitto yesterday about this fix.
